name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Lindsay Lohan has to go back to court after showing up more than an hour late for community service. But her lawyer says she's got a good excuse. She forgot to steal a watch.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: President Obama is going to be a guest on "The Tonight Show" with Jay Leno. I'm surprised, because his popularity is at an all-time low. And there are people in the streets marching against him. So it's nice of President Obama to help him out.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: The movie "Paranormal Activity 3" is out today. They're pumping these movies out really fast. In the new one, the kids are haunted by the ghost of Moammar Gadhafi.
